attributes.action: Force all lorries and towed caravans to remain in the inside lane on Motorways with NO overtaking allowed. All Lorries and Caravans must leave at least 100 metres between each other to allow other motorists to leave the motorway when required.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As with other petitions on this site I agree totally with the argument that lorries and towed caravans overtaking are a major factor in motorway congestion and accidents. I would like the government however to bring in even more stringent measures whereby these vehicles are only allowed to stay in the left hand lane at ALL times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
